summary: A collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 3-4, 2019. The documents show routine inmate population counts and movement logs, including a specific roster listing Jeffrey Epstein as being out for an attorney visit on August 4, 2019.

events.title: Epstein's Attorney Visit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is logged as being out of his housing unit for an attorney visit (ATTY) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Routine Prison Population Counts
events.description: Multiple official count sheets and inmate rosters document the routine population counts and movements of inmates at the MCC New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is documented as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 4, 2019.
An inmate roster from August 4, 2019, at 09:57:51 shows Epstein (Reg # 76318-054) was scheduled for an attorney visit (ATTY).
The documents are routine Bureau of Prisons administrative records (count sheets, rosters, out-count forms) from the days immediately preceding Epstein's death.
The total inmate population at MCC New York during these counts was approximately 762, with counts verified at 761 and 739 on different logs.
Other inmates are listed in various statuses such as hospital (HOSP), food service (FS), and suicide watch (SUICIDE OR UNASSG).
